
---- L298 Pin Map (ESP32):
#define CONFIG_DCC_TRACK_SIGNAL_PIN 19
#define CONFIG_OPS_HBRIDGE_L298 1
#define CONFIG_OPSTRACK_ADC_CHANNEL_0 1
#define CONFIG_PROG_HBRIDGE_L298 1
#define CONFIG_PROGTRACK_ADC_CHANNEL_3 1
#define CONFIG_OPS_TRACK_ENABLE_PIN 25
#define CONFIG_PROG_TRACK_ENABLE_PIN 23
#define CONFIG_RAILCOM_DISABLED 1
#define CONFIG_I2C_SCL_PIN 22
#define CONFIG_I2C_SDA_PIN 21

---- L298 Pin Map (ESP32-S2):
#define CONFIG_DCC_TRACK_SIGNAL_PIN 21
#define CONFIG_OPS_HBRIDGE_L298 1
#define CONFIG_OPSTRACK_ADC2_CHANNEL_6 1
#define CONFIG_PROG_HBRIDGE_L298 1
#define CONFIG_PROGTRACK_ADC2_CHANNEL_7 1
#define CONFIG_OPS_TRACK_ENABLE_PIN 8
#define CONFIG_PROG_TRACK_ENABLE_PIN 16
#define CONFIG_I2C_SCL_PIN 34
#define CONFIG_I2C_SDA_PIN 33
